title: arunduvOm kavi
sahitya:
arunduvOm kavi virundE azhagu shoTTum kALidAsan amuda kalasha vAkkinilE


anupallavi

  tirundu pulavar pOTrap-porundum uvamaiyuDan deivap-pulavan vaiyamuyyat-tEDi vaitta pATTinilE


caraNam    guha kumArasambhavam raghuvamsham mEghadUtam kozhum shuvaigaL pongi ezhum kalai cittiram
sahamellAm koNDADum shAkuntala nATakam tanda sandak-kuyil shuddhAnandam tuLLik-kudikka
